long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Win Win is a simple but powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your multitasking capabilities by effortlessly managing and organizing your browser windows. Whether you're a student, professional, or a multitasking enthusiast, Win Win helps you streamline your workflow and boost productivity.

Key Features:

Split Tabs with Ease:
   - Seamlessly split your current browser window into two side-by-side windows.
   - Automatically resize windows to a balanced 40/60 split, perfect for comparing documents, browsing multiple sites, or keeping an eye on essential tasks.

Efficient Window Merging:
   - Combine multiple browser windows into one with a single click.
   - Ensure your workspace is tidy and organized by merging all tabs into the main window.

Smart Tab Management:
   - Automatically move tabs based on your active selection.
   - If there’s only one tab, the extension creates an empty window for new tasks.
   - For multiple tabs, move the active tab and all tabs to its right to the new window.

User-Friendly Interface:
   - Simple, intuitive interface designed to make window management effortless.
   - Buttons are disabled and greyed out based on window availability, ensuring clear and straightforward usability.

Dynamic Tab Count:
   - Real-time tab count displayed on the extension icon, helping you keep track of your open tabs.

Latest Updates
Version 1.0.2:
   - Minor Bugfixes: Addressed small issues to improve overall functionality and stability.

Version 1.0.1:
   - Minor Fixes and Enhancements:
   - Resolved various small bugs and issues to improve the overall stability and performance of the extension.
   - Enhanced error handling for better management of edge cases and unexpected scenarios.
   - Made code optimizations for improved maintainability and efficiency.

Why Install Win Win?

   - Boost Productivity: Optimize your browsing experience by easily managing multiple tasks, research projects, or work assignments simultaneously.
   - Stay Organized: Keep your desktop clutter-free by efficiently splitting and merging browser windows based on your needs.
   - Improve Workflow: Whether you’re comparing documents, browsing different sites, or keeping essential tabs open, Win Win makes multitasking a breeze.
   - Simple and Effective: With an elegant and minimalist design, Win Win provides powerful functionality without the complexity.

Get Win Win Today!

Transform the way you multitask with your browser and take control of your workflow. Install Win Win now and experience the benefits of balanced, efficient window management.

Testimonial
"I showed this humble extension to my girlfriend, she wasn't impressed—but I find it very useful and enables me to get the most out of a 16-inch screen."
- The Developer
